Song.title: Day After Day
Song.copyright: Jon Ryan (Jonathan and Ryan Baird) © 2003 by West Coast Revival and Ugg Music.

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Cast upon my [E]Savior’s cross are [F#M7]all my sins[E] And [D]never will you [E]choose Lord to re[F#M7]member them[E] Your [D]cleansing blood has [E]covered me And [F#M7]washed me clean, it will [E]never fail
Chorus: [A2]Day after [D2]day, [A]you never [E]change With [A]power to [D2]save, and [A]strength to su[E]stain And we [A]p r [D2]a i [A]s e[E] We [A]p r [D2]a i [A]s e[E]… Your [D]name[E] [F#M7] [E]
Verse 2: [D]Justified by [E]what you’ve done at [F#M7]Calvary[E] Now [D]living in the [E]righteousness se[F#M7]cured for me[E] For [D]when You died and [E]rose again You [F#M7]conquered death and de[E]feated sin
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 cast upon my saviors cross are all my sins and never will you choose lord to remember them your cleansing blood has covered me and washed me clean it will never fail chorus day after day you never change with power to save and strength to sustain and we p r a i s e we p r a i s e your name verse 2 justified by what youve done at calvary now living in the righteousness secured for me for when you died and rose again you conquered death and defeated sin
